info:
# minimize top's output in batch mode

run top in interactive mode (dont use -b)

open column configuration menu (f) and toggle values

quit (q) menu

configure display using (l, t, m) to remove extra

save configuration (shift + w)

quit (q) top

run top in batch mode (top -b) to see the changes

name: stderr
func:
const stderr = msg.payload.toString().split('\n');

node.send([{ stderr }, { payload: {fill: 'red', text: `${new Date().toString()}` } } ]);
